data.comment: Today's referee, Yong-woo Kim, has blown to start the match.
Yong-woo Kim signals a free kick to Gwangju in their own half.
In the minute 2, Throw-in Daegu.
Throw-in for Daegu in the half of Gwangju.
Can Gwangju get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Daegu's half?
In the minute 5, Free kick for Daegu in the half of Gwangju.
Yong-woo Kim signals a Daegu throw-in in Gwangju's half.
Gwangju needs to be cautious. Daegu have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 10, Gwangju awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Daegu in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 15, Throw-in for Gwangju in their own half.
Free kick Daegu.
Daegu drive upfield and Cesinha gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Gwangju defender.
In the minute 17, Daegu have been awarded a corner by Yong-woo Kim.
Corner awarded to Gwangju.
Gwangju to take a throw-in in Daegu territory.
In the minute 20, In Gwangju Daegu drive forward through Cesinha. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Yong-woo Kim signals a throw-in for Daegu, close to Gwangju's area.
Corner awarded to Daegu.
In the minute 23, Throw-in high up the field for Daegu in Gwangju.
In Gwangju, Daegu push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Gwangju to take a throw-in in Daegu territory.
In the minute 27, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Gwangju close to the penalty box.
Ball safe as Daegu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Daegu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gwangju's half?
In the minute 29, Gwangju awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kim Jeong-hwan (Gwangju) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Gwangju have been awarded a corner by Yong-woo Kim.
In the minute 31, Yong-woo Kim signals a free kick to Gwangju in their own half.
Yong-woo Kim awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Daegu at Gwangju World Cup Stadium.
In the minute 34, Gwangju have been awarded a corner by Yong-woo Kim.
Daegu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Daegu in the half of Gwangju.
In the minute 36, In Gwangju a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Shin Chang-moo is booked for the away team.
Throw-in Daegu.
In the minute 38, Ball goes out of play for a Daegu goal kick.
Yong-woo Kim signals a Daegu throw-in in Gwangju's half.
Throw-in for Daegu in their own half.
In the minute 40, Free kick for Daegu in their own half.
Corner awarded to Gwangju.
Gwangju are coming forward and Yeo Reum gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 41, Daegu have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Daegu close to the penalty box.
Cesinha (Daegu) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Park Jeong-su is back on his feet again.
In the minute 45, Daegu have been awarded a corner by Yong-woo Kim.
Yong-woo Kim awards Gwangju a goal kick.
The first-half has come to a close in Gwangju.
In the minute 45, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Park Jeong-su for Gwangju who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway at Gwangju World Cup Stadium.
Ball safe as Gwangju is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Daegu's Kim Dae-won gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 48, It's a goal kick for the home team in Gwangju.
Can Daegu capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Gwangju's half?
Goal kick for Gwangju at Gwangju World Cup Stadium.
In the minute 50, Gwangju awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Yong-woo Kim signals a free kick to Gwangju.
In the minute 51, Rustamjon Ashurmatov's header is off-target for Gwangju.
Ball goes out of play for a Daegu goal kick.
The home team have replaced Kim Jeong-hwan with Kim Hyo-gi. This is the first substitution made today by Park Jin Seob.
Gwangju awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 53, Throw-in for Daegu at Gwangju World Cup Stadium.
Yong-woo Kim signals a free kick to Daegu.
Yong-woo Kim awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 55, Yong-woo Kim signals a free kick to Daegu in their own half.
Yong-woo Kim awards Gwangju a goal kick.
Yong-woo Kim awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 58, Free kick for Gwangju in the half of Daegu.
Free kick for Daegu in their own half.
Yong-woo Kim signals a free kick to Gwangju in their own half.
In the minute 61, Goal kick for Gwangju at Gwangju World Cup Stadium.
Gwangju awarded a free kick in their own half.
Oh Hu-seong is replacing Kim Dae-won for Daegu at Gwangju World Cup Stadium.
In the minute 63, Throw-in for Daegu at Gwangju World Cup Stadium.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Gwangju.
In the minute 64, Can Gwangju get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Daegu's half?
Free kick for Gwangju in their own half.
Yong-woo Kim signals a Gwangju throw-in in Daegu's half.
In the minute 67, Daegu have been awarded a corner by Yong-woo Kim.
Daegu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal! Ryu Jae-moon gives Daegu a 0-1 lead.
In the minute 70, Ball safe as Daegu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Daegu.
Gwangju have a goal kick.
In the minute 73, In Gwangju a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Gwangju in their own half.
Throw-in Daegu.
In the minute 75, Gwangju to take a throw-in in Daegu territory.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Gwangju have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 77, Throw-in for Daegu in their own half.
Yong-woo Kim awards Gwangju a goal kick.
Yong-woo Kim signals a free kick to Gwangju in their own half.
In the minute 79, Daegu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gwangju needs to be cautious. Daegu have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 81, Daegu have been awarded a corner by Yong-woo Kim.
Park Jin Seob is making the team's second substitution at Gwangju World Cup Stadium with Choi Jun-hyeok replacing Kim Chang-su.
Free kick in a good position for Gwangju!
Free kick for Daegu in their own half.
In the minute 83, Free kick Daegu.
In the minute 84, Daegu's Ryu Jae-moon misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Gwangju.
At Gwangju World Cup Stadium, Yeo Reum has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Gwangju's Choi Jun-hyeok has been booked in Gwangju.
Corner awarded to Gwangju.
In the minute 86, Eom Won-sang for Gwangju gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Daegu goal kick.
Throw-in Daegu.
In the minute 87, Ball safe as Daegu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Daegu in the half of Gwangju.
Can Daegu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gwangju's half?
In the minute 88, Daegu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Gwangju in their own half.
Gwangju awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 89, Yong-woo Kim signals a free kick to Gwangju in their own half.
Throw-in for Gwangju at Gwangju World Cup Stadium.
Free kick for Gwangju in their own half.
Yong-woo Kim will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
In Gwangju a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Yong-woo Kim signals a free kick to Daegu in their own half.
Corner awarded to Gwangju.
Daegu are caught offside.
Yong-woo Kim signals a throw-in for Gwangju, close to Daegu's area.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-1.
Lee Jin-hyun is on a sub for Park Han-Bin for Daegu.
